title: Changing Summoner Icons into a Summoner Crest
body:
I'm new to Boards, so forgive me if this has been discussed or if I'm in the wrong place, but here's an idea I like.

It's nice that Riot enjoys rewarding players for partaking in events or gifting friends with purchasable content or even giving us a way to cheer on our favourite team, etc, by giving us a variety of icons to choose from, but I feel as though it's starting to get a bit much (I for one have 55 extra icons). Though, instead of making the argument that Riot should reduce the amount of icons rewarded to players, instead propose they could allow us to pick several at a time, as such changing the Summoner Icon into a Summoner Crest (or any other name, that part isn't important).

The idea is that players may choose 4 icons, which would be laid out 2x2. I've thought about it for a while and haven't really come across many issues that may arise seeing as there are plenty of icons, even for new players, to make up the 4 with ease. The main issue would be the size, but I'm sure that's an easy fix. As for issues with profile banners for the ultimate skins, you could always just let us choose our banner, instead of it syncing with the icon (something which I didn't understand why it wasn't implemented from the start).

For example: {{champion:103}} {{item:3157}} *Edit: These icons would be the layout of the Summoner Icons
..................... {{summoner:14}} {{champion:1}} 

Let me know your thoughts. :)
